vectorString.description: The abbreviated CVSS version followed by most of the metrics

baseScore.description: A general numeric score for the exploitation

baseSeverity.description: A general severity score for the exploitation

attackComplexity.description: Describes the measurable actions that must be taken by the attacker to actively evade or circumvent existing built-in security-enhancing conditions in order to exploit the vulnerability

attackRequirements.description: Declares the prerequisite deployment and execution conditions or variables of the vulnerable system that enable the attack

privilegesRequired.description: Describes the level of privileges an attacker must possess to exploit the vulnerability

userInteraction.description: Describes the requirement for a human user, other than the attacker, to participate in the successful compromise of the vulnerable system

impact.description: Measures the impact to the systems CIA due to a successfully exploited vulnerability

vuln.description: The impact on the vulnerable system

sub.description: The impact on any subsequent system

automatable.description: Declares if the attacker can automate exploitation events across multiple targets

valueDensity.description: Describes the resources that the attacker will gain control over with a single exploitation event

responseEffort.description: Provide supplemental information on how difficult it to provide an initial response to the impact of vulnerabilities for deployed products and services

exploitMaturity.description: Describes the likelihood of the vulnerability being attacked based on the current state of exploit techniques, scripts availability, or active 'live real world' exploitation
